item.description:
Details
Valley Marketing is the area?s most diversified promotional products and corporate recognition distributor in this area. Located at the Eastworks Building in Easthampton, Massachusetts, Valley Marketing offers promotional products, corporate recognition, online services, graphics and fulfillment. Company owner and President John Richards will present an outline of this unique industry and answer questions such as: What is a promotional product, how to select a product and how to bring your product or idea to the promotional product market. Valley Marketing services major corporate clients, small area businesses and non-profits, including public TV and public radio in Western Massachusetts and Connecticut
item.why: We have a mix seasoned entrepreneurs and inventors along with beginners.
item.name: Innovators' Resource Network April Meeting
